reviews.quote: I absolutely love my new ARVA Atlas Sectional! The back support is way better than my old couch. I can actually sit comfortably for hours while watching TV.
reviews.name: Sarah Thompson

reviews.quote: This sectional is so comfy! It’s perfect for both lounging and sitting up straight. The fabric feels super durable, too.
reviews.name: Mark Johnson

reviews.quote: Just what I was looking for! The modular design makes it easy to rearrange, and the pet-friendly fabric is a lifesaver with my two dogs.
reviews.name: Emily Davis

reviews.quote: I’m really impressed! The couch doesn’t sag like others I’ve tried. It feels like it’s made to last, which is nice.
reviews.name: Brian Lee

reviews.quote: This sectional is awesome! The spill-resistant fabric is perfect for my busy home. I just wipe it down if anything spills.
reviews.name: Jessica Martinez

reviews.quote: So happy with this purchase! The supportive core keeps it comfortable, and the design fits perfectly in my small living room.
reviews.name: David Wilson

reviews.quote: Love the ARVA Atlas! It’s stylish and super sturdy. I can tell it’s built for the long run, which gives me peace of mind.
reviews.name: Rachel Brown

reviews.quote: Great buy! The sectional is easy to move and it’s so nice to have real back support. Totally worth it!
reviews.name: Tom Anderson

reviews.quote: I can’t get over how comfortable this couch is! The fabric is also really great at resisting my cat’s claws. Win-win!
reviews.name: Lisa Harris

reviews.quote: Super impressed with this purchase. The couch has a sturdy design and looks fantastic in my living room. I love it!
reviews.name: Chris Clark

faq.question: Is it too firm or too soft?
faq.answer: Balanced support — not overly soft, not stiff. Designed to feel comfortable for long sits while keeping a clean, tailored look.

faq.question: Will it feel cheap compared to more expensive cloud sofas?
faq.answer: ARVA is priced for value, not corners. The difference is markup and logistics — not a 'disposable' build.

faq.question: What if I don't like it after it arrives?
faq.answer: Try it at home for 100 days. Returns are a flat $99 pickup fee with carrier assistance. No restocking fees.

faq.question: How does delivery work?
faq.answer: Ships in 2–4 weeks. We'll coordinate delivery, and the packaging is designed to reduce transit issues.

faq.question: How hard is assembly, really?
faq.answer: Tool-free assembly in minutes. Modular pieces connect cleanly.

faq.question: Is the fabric safe and durable?
faq.answer: OEKO-TEX® certified fabric with a durable, everyday-friendly weave.

faq.question: What does the lifetime warranty cover?
faq.answer: Lifetime structural coverage (frame/structural components).

Avoid harsh chemicals and abrasive brushes.

reviews.quote: I love how supportive this sofa is! The back is higher than my old one, making it perfect for lounging and sitting up straight. Definitely a great buy!

reviews.quote: This sofa has exceeded my expectations! It supports my back perfectly and resists pet hair, which is a lifesaver. Couldn’t be happier!

reviews.quote: The ARVA Atlas is a game changer! It’s not just comfy for lounging, but the support is on point when I sit up. Such a solid piece for any space!

reviews.quote: I was worried about the size, but it fits perfectly in my apartment. The back support is way better than my last couch, and it's built to last!

reviews.quote: Super happy with my purchase! The fabric is tough and easy to clean, plus I love how it stays supportive after long hours of sitting. Highly recommend!

reviews.quote: This is my favorite piece of furniture! It doesn’t just collapse under me like others do, and the design is so easy to assemble. It’s perfect for my living space.

reviews.quote: Love how cozy this sofa is! I can sit up and feel great support without feeling stiff. Plus, it’s held up wonderfully with my pets around!

reviews.quote: The ARVA Atlas is built so well! The material is super resistant to wear and tear, and I appreciate that it’s made to last for years. It’s a real winner!

reviews.quote: I was looking for a sofa that could handle daily life, and this one is it! The back support is fantastic, and the fabric is easy to maintain. So satisfied!
reviews.name: Natalie Scott

reviews.quote: Really love this couch! It’s comfy in any position, and the modular design makes it easy to rearrange my space. Definitely worth the investment!

reviews.quote: Such a great find! The pet-friendly design is wonderful, and I love how supportive it is. It’s held up so well with my two dogs around!
reviews.name: Jessica Martinez

faq.question: Is it too firm or too soft?
faq.answer: Balanced support - designed to feel substantial without being stiff. You can lounge for hours without sinking too deep. We avoid the over-soft 'cloud' feel that doesn't hold up over time.

faq.question: How long does assembly take?
faq.answer: Most people finish in under 30 minutes. Tool-free - you unbox, unroll the components, and connect them. No special skills required.

faq.question: Are the covers removable?
faq.answer: The main fabric is fixed. We're happy to share care instructions for spot cleaning and maintenance. Check the product care guide for details.

faq.question: How does delivery work?
faq.answer: Ships in boxes via standard carrier. You'll get tracking and typically receive it within 2-4 weeks. No freight trucks or appointment windows - delivery to your door.

faq.question: Is it easy to move later?
faq.answer: Yes. Modular design and vacuum-packed-style packaging make it easier to move or reconfigure than traditional sectionals. Pieces can be broken down and reassembled.

faq.question: Does it work in larger living spaces?
faq.answer: Yes. The 102" width and modular system work in larger rooms. You can add chaises or ottomans to scale the look. Designed to feel substantial without dominating the space.

faq.question: What does the lifetime warranty cover?
faq.answer: The frame and structural components are covered for the lifetime of the product under normal household use. If the frame fails, we'll repair or replace it. Fabric and cushions have separate coverage - see our warranty page for details.

valueStack:
🧩 Modular by Design
Configure, expand, or rearrange to fit any outdoor space.

☀️ UV-Resistant Fabric
Engineered to resist fading, stains, and daily exposure.

💧 Fast-Dry Cushions
Moisture-releasing foam dries quickly and keeps its shape.

🔒 Secure Connections
Hidden connectors keep sections locked in place.

🌬 Elevated Base
Improves airflow while enhancing stability.

🌦 All-Weather Build
Designed for sun, moisture, and daily outdoor living.

📦 Compact Delivery
Ships in manageable boxes for easy access and setup.

🛠 Tool-Free Assembly
No tools required—assemble or reconfigure in minutes.

reviews.quote: I really love the back support on this sectional. It's way better than what I expected for outdoor furniture! Perfect for sitting up and chatting with friends.
reviews.name: Mark Johnson

reviews.quote: This sofa is super comfy and just what I needed for my patio. The fabric is also really easy to clean, which is a big plus for me and my kids!
reviews.name: Laura Smith

reviews.quote: I’m really impressed with how durable it feels. I have two dogs, and the pet-friendly design is holding up like a champ! No fur troubles here.
reviews.name: Jason Lee

reviews.quote: This sectional looks amazing in my yard. It fits my space perfectly, and I love that it has real back support. Makes sitting out there so much better.
reviews.name: Samantha Brown

reviews.quote: So happy with my purchase! The modular design makes it super easy to rearrange for gatherings. Plus, it looks great and feels even better.
reviews.name: David Garcia

reviews.quote: I’ve had this sectional for a few months and it’s still just as supportive as day one. I appreciate that it doesn't sag at all, even after long hangouts.
reviews.name: Emily Davis

reviews.quote: This sofa is a game changer! It was easy to set up and even easier to clean. Love how the spills just bead off the fabric.
reviews.name: Brian Wilson

reviews.quote: I’m so glad I got this sectional. The comfort is amazing, and it actually looks stylish on my deck. It’s built to last, that’s for sure!
reviews.name: Megan Clark

reviews.quote: Great piece for our outdoor setup! The supportive structure is noticeable, and I love how easy it is to move around. Perfect for hosting!
reviews.name: Henry Martinez

reviews.quote: This sectional is fantastic! It's comfy enough for lounging but provides great back support too. I could sit out there all day with friends!
reviews.name: Ashley Robinson

reviews.quote: I'm pleasantly surprised by how easy it is to clean. Kids can be messy, but this fabric really does resist spills like they say!
reviews.name: Angela Walker

reviews.quote: I love this sectional! It was exactly what I wanted, and the quality is top-notch. My family loves it, and it’s perfect for our backyard parties.
reviews.name: Carlos Rodriguez

faq.question: Is it too firm or too soft?
faq.answer: Balanced support - designed to feel substantial without being stiff. You can lounge for hours without sinking too deep. We avoid the over-soft 'cloud' feel that doesn't hold up over time.

faq.question: How long does assembly take?
faq.answer: Most people finish in under 30 minutes. Tool-free - you unbox, unroll the components, and connect them. No special skills required.

faq.question: Are the covers removable?
faq.answer: The main fabric is fixed. We're happy to share care instructions for spot cleaning and maintenance. Check the product care guide for details.

faq.question: How does delivery work?
faq.answer: Ships in boxes via standard carrier. You'll get tracking and typically receive it within 2-4 weeks. No freight trucks or appointment windows - delivery to your door.

faq.question: Is it easy to move later?
faq.answer: Yes. Modular design and vacuum-packed-style packaging make it easier to move or reconfigure than traditional sectionals. Pieces can be broken down and reassembled.

faq.question: Does it work in larger living spaces?
faq.answer: Yes. The 102" width and modular system work in larger rooms. You can add chaises or ottomans to scale the look. Designed to feel substantial without dominating the space.

faq.question: What does the lifetime warranty cover?
faq.answer: The frame and structural components are covered for the lifetime of the product under normal household use. If the frame fails, we'll repair or replace it. Fabric and cushions have separate coverage - see our warranty page for details.

oris-sectional.finalCtaSubhead: Designed to look expensive. Priced to make sense.
careAndDurability: Weather-resistant fabric designed for outdoor use.
Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild soap.
Avoid harsh chemicals and abrasive brushes.
For best results, treat spills promptly and cover or store in harsh weather.
oris-sectional.warrantyClarity: Lifetime structural warranty on frame components.

reviews.quote: Finally a sofa that actually fit through my door. Assembly took maybe 20 minutes. Looks and feels premium.
The depth is perfect for lounging. Not too soft, not a brick. Exactly what I wanted.
Delivery was straightforward. No freight, no drama. Set it up in under 30 minutes.
We've had it for a year. No sagging. The modular thing is real - we added an ottoman later.
Return process was clear. $99 pickup, no hassle. (We ended up keeping it.)
Clean look, comfortable. Doesn't feel like a budget option at all.

faq.question: Is it too firm or too soft?
faq.answer: Balanced support — not overly soft, not stiff. Designed to feel comfortable for long sits while keeping a clean, tailored look.

faq.question: Will it feel cheap compared to more expensive cloud sofas?
faq.answer: ARVA is priced for value, not corners. The difference is markup and logistics — not a 'disposable' build.

faq.question: What if I don't like it after it arrives?
faq.answer: Try it at home for 100 days. Returns are a flat $99 pickup fee with carrier assistance. No restocking fees.

faq.question: How does delivery work?
faq.answer: Ships in 2–4 weeks. We'll coordinate delivery, and the packaging is designed to reduce transit issues.

faq.question: How hard is assembly, really?
faq.answer: Tool-free assembly in minutes. Modular pieces connect cleanly.

faq.question: Is the fabric safe and durable?
faq.answer: OEKO-TEX® certified fabric with a durable, everyday-friendly weave.

faq.question: What does the lifetime warranty cover?
faq.answer: Lifetime structural coverage (frame/structural components).

careAndDurability: Designed for everyday use with a durable performance weave.
Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild soap.
Avoid harsh chemicals and abrasive brushes.
For best results, treat spills promptly.
bellini-sectional.warrantyClarity: Lifetime structural warranty covers frame/structural components.
